name: une game de solitaire
description:
pour les anglos (le fr suit)

this game was made as part of a chain-game with some good people and some that aren't as good

so now, the game is out. born from a broken chain.

use mouse

the game is in québécois

warning : the part with the white cards is kinda laggy

warning : i can't be bothered to fix it!!!

pour les francos : 

joue avec la souris, inquiète-toi pas du reste
